reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown super sexy without being too exposed, very soft, and comfortable. The material quality receives positive feedback, with one customer specifically mentioning the satin and lace combination. While some it fits perfectly, others find it runs too small. The build quality receives mixed reviews, with several customers describing it as poorly made.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and comfy!
items.body: You never really know if what you buy online will actually look like the picture but this dress looks just like the picture and it's so cute! I'm about 5'2" and it fit just right lengthwise! Hugs the curves. Very flattering. Read more
items.author: Shaina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: Love this one. It does run tight at waist and hips. I am size ten, but ordered a large. Fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Judy Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much nicer than I expected or hoped for - very sexy
items.body: The material is nice, it's not luxurious, but it's not irritating. I wanted something I could sleep in, and it's definitely comfortable enough to do so. It's also got a nice shine to it, and the way it contours to the body is very flattering. It's way more flattering than I anticipated. For reference, I'm 5'1" 115 lbs with big hips and C cups and I got the small. It was not too long, a rarity when you're my height. It clung to my midriff and hips nicely. The slits go up high enough to be really sexy, but not too high. The top held me in reasonably safely, I'd say it was about perfect for me, but I'd say spillage would be likely if you have a D cup and get the small. The only area that didn't fit perfectly is the back, it didn't cling like the front did which sometimes bothers me as it can make me look much thicker from the side, but I thought it worked for this dress. Read more
items.author: Genevieve

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Husband approved
items.body: Runs small but the husband likes the material and the cut. Sexy in all the right places with a free show occasionally. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size up!
items.body: I wear a medium however, I have pretty wide hips, & This does NOT fit. I'd size up 2x if I were you. Even though I wear a Med. I should of probably ordered a 1x - Super unfortunate cause It's very pretty & I love the material, very comfy. Just wish It fit. Read more
items.author: PennyLynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s so beautiful and fits perfect
items.body: Love it it’s absolutely perfect Read more
items.author: James goff

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and sexy
items.body: I absolutely love these nighties. They are so elegant and soft. The size fits me perfectly and I love the length. The quality of the fabric is wonderful and I adore the floral pattern with the satin and lace. This is my second piece as I was gifted the white one and loved it so much, I bought the pink one. Read more
items.author: Sarah Phillips-Horel

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor construction
items.body: Although this gown was beautiful, it was very poorly made. I tried it on and it looked nice, and I only wore it for a short time when the back of the material started separating from the elastic in the back very disappointing. Read more
items.author: W. Denise

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Floral, Brick Red Floral, Pink Floral-satin, Black, White Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
